Office of the City Administrator/City Secretary
===============================================




The City of Weston Lakes daily operations are administered by a council appointed City Administrator/City Secretary (currently one position). This position handles the business of the city in the day-to-day function but also covers the designated duties of the City Secretary by the State of Texas.

The duties of the City Secretary’s Office are as follows:

Drafting and posting of meeting agendas and minutes of ALL city public meetings.

Record Retention as dictated by state law (TSLAC) and adopted by the city council.

To find a copy of the City of Weston Lakes Public Information Request Form,
[CLICK HERE.](https://westonlakestexas.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/OpenRecordsRequests-1.pdf)
